title: The Upsessions - Beat You Reggae [2009]
description:
The Upsessions are an early reggae-styled band from Haarlem and Amsterdam. They were founded in 2005 by trombone player Giel (former member of Amsterdam-based ska band De Hardheid) and lead vocalist Boss (former bassplayer of Rude Rich and the High Notes).
